title: Drawing, "Sideboard", September 30, 1933
medium: Graphite on tracing paper, ruled border in graphite
markings: Stamp in black ink, lower left: DONALD DESKEY/145 WEST 57TH STREET/NEW YORK CITY
inscribed: Inscribed in orange color pencil at upper right: DIN-A1; inscribed in red color pencil at lower right: P; lower right in graphite: SCALE 1"=1'0"/7482 [circled]; lower left in graphite: K. 9/30/33; Inscribed dimensions
description: Perspective, plan, and elevation drawing for sideboard. Rounded front corners and squared back corners; two stacked drawers with rectangular pulls. Strap legs (metal?) with rounded feet and stretcher between front and back legs.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Sideboard", September 30, 1933.
September 30, 1933. Graphite on tracing paper, ruled border in graphite. Gift of Donald Deskey. 1988-101-909.
